metadata.title: CVE-2021-3669 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: [reading /proc/sysvipc/shm does not scale with large shared memory segment counts]

notes.note: sbeattie> I think the issue is what is being addressed in the referenced lkml thread.

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
